title: (x) Dolce and Gabbana - Futura (customized?) {Eduardo}
content: Could you identify the typeface for the Dolce and Gabbana logo? Thanks
author: bellevuewolf

comments.content:
Here's a [link](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417022543/http:/www.dolcegabbana.it/) for D&G.   
Looks like Futura. Not sure what exact version, though.

Very close to Futura but there are some differences: the G and B for example, and in the weight of Futura that best matches the logo, which is Futura regular (not book, heavy, etc) the points of the N and the A would still be sharp. I dunno... so it could be customized or a Futura knockoff.
Did you look at Avant Guard? Maybe a medium weight
That is definitely not Avant Garde. Look at the 'G'.

Nah, it's a version of Futura. Can't explain the cut-off   
bits on the A and N, but all the other earmarks point   
to Futura. Customized? Could be.
